Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Sri Lanka's highest chase against Netherlands: 263
Engelbrecht and van Beek rebuilt with a 130-run seventh wicket stand
Kusal Perera and Kusal Mendis both fell to Aryan Dutt
Pathum Nissanka hit a fine half-century
Sri Lanka's first win in the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka made two changes to their side: Dushan Hemantha and Kasun Rajitha replacing Dunith Wellalage and Lahiru Kumara
Netherlands are riding the confidence of their win over South Africa
Sri Lanka are yet to win in the tournament after three games
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's first win in the World Cup, ending a streak of three consecutive losses
Sri Lanka's move to No. 4 has worked wonders for Sadeera Samarawickrama, who averages 10 runs more in that position compared to his career numbers
Aryan Dutt's heroic efforts with the ball
Scott Edwards praised Engelbrecht and van Beek for their rescue job
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won despite a historic seventh-wicket stand between Engelbrecht and van Beek
Aryan Dutt took three wickets in his last over
Kusal Mendis and Kusal Perera both fell to Aryan Dutt
Sri Lanka's move to No. 4 has worked wonders for Sadeera Samarawickrama, who averages 10 runs more in that position compared to his career numbers
Pathum Nissanka hit a fine half-century
Netherlands' 262 is their highest total against Sri Lanka, going past the 258 way back in 2006
